description:
Western North Dakota's Premiere Full-Service Law Firm

Sand Law in Watford City, North Dakota, offers a full range of legal services aimed at protecting the rights, interests and liberties of those we serve. With four law office locations across the region, we offer convenient access to high-quality legal representation to individuals, families and business owners throughout western North Dakota who face legal challenges involving any of the following:

• Criminal defense for all types of felony and misdemeanor charges, including DUI/DWI, drug violations, violent crimes, domestic abuse and white collar crimes


• Personal injury and wrongful death claims involving automobile and commercial truck accidents, premises liability and slip-and-fall accidents, dog bites, oil field injuries, and more


• Business services such as entity formation and incorporation, contract review and drafting, regulatory compliance and other related matters


• Commercial litigation and business disputes involving debt collection, breaches of contract, tort and liability issues, and liens

The Trusted Source For High-Quality Legal Advocacy And Support

Established by experienced attorneys Rick Sand and William Anthony Sand, our law firm has become the trusted source for top-notch legal counsel and effective advocacy for many in our community. Combining our years of legal experience, we work as a team in order to provide our clients with the strongest case possible, and we will use every tool at our disposal to help you achieve the most favorable outcome for your situation.

From this high level of client commitment and support, our attorneys have received top ratings from both our clients and peers alike so you can rest assured knowing your case is in capable hands. Although we prepare every case for trial, we will negotiate on your behalf whenever possible, and whether through negotiation or litigation, you can trust that we will always work hard to protect your rights and best interests.

To find out more about how Sand Law can best serve you, your family or your business with your legal challenge, you can contact our law office to schedule a free initial consultation.
